extracted_playbook.title: Update to Version 1.38
extracted_playbook.description: Update Rockwell Automation software to version 1.38 to address the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Risk Mitigations
extracted_playbook.description: Apply risk mitigations as suggested by Rockwell Automation to minimize the risk of vulnerability exploitation.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Security Best Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Implement suggested security best practices, such as maintaining mappings to prevent exploitation and manually removing previously mapped users if necessary.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet. Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: Use secure methods for remote access, such as virtual private networks (VPNs), ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Implement measures to protect against social engineering attacks, such as not clicking web links or opening attachments in unsolicited email messages.
